thread.title: Artec 3D Partners with 3D Systems on Complete 3D-Scan-to-CAD Solutions
thread.title_full: Artec 3D Partners with 3D Systems on Complete 3D-Scan-to-CAD Solutions

title: Artec 3D Partners with 3D Systems on Complete 3D-Scan-to-CAD Solutions
text:
Expand Leading developer of 3D scanning and software products, Artec 3D , has launched a new product bundle with 3D Systems to deliver a complete 3D-scan-to-CAD process to customers. 
The global promotion, running through Spring 2016, will equip customers with a full suite of reverse engineering hardware and design/inspection software starting from $35,990. These packages include Artec’s professional grade Eva or recently released Space Spider handheld 3D scanners in addition to 3D Systems’ Geomagic Design X platform and a one-year subscription to Artec Studio 10 . 
The Artec Eva and Space Spider enable users to easily capture complex objects, particularly those with sharp edges or small parts that may be difficult to capture in any other way, in high resolution and vibrant colour. 
“No 3D scanner, no matter how proficient, can stand alone,” explained, Artyom Yukhin, president and CEO of Artec 3D. “It requires the support of software solutions that are equally as adept to turn captured data and cloud points into a desired object, recreated or newly invented, that can one day be held in your hand. We’re excited to work with 3D Systems in this endeavour by offering designers and engineers the complete package of solutions necessary to further their work and the industry as a whole.” × Expand 
Following the 3D scanning process, images can be post-processed to produce a watertight model using Artec’s Studio 10 software. The finished model can then be exported to the Geomagic Design X platform to create feature-based, editable solid models compatible with popular MCAD platforms. 
Calvin Hur, VP, co-COO and Chief Revenue Officer for Software at 3D Systems, added: “Geomagic Design X leads the industry in enabling 3D scan-to-CAD solutions. The 2016 version of our software, when paired with Artec’s high quality scanners, delivers unparalleled performance and streamlined creation of accurate CAD data from real world objects.” 
The following bundles are now available for purchase: Artec Eva 3D scanner, Geomagic Design X software and one year of Artec Studio Professional ($35,990 USD | 29,900 EUR); Artec Space Spider 3D scanner, Geomagic Design X software and one year of Artec Studio Professional ($43,350 USD | 36,900 EUR); and Artec Eva and Space Spider, Geomagic Design X software and one year of Artec Studio Professional ($55,290 USD | 45,900 EUR).
